desc: 测试使用一个字段更新另一个字段
name: UpdateStaffWithColumn
desc: 测试点：简单的更新，不含子表

oqls.desc: 将更新人更新为创建人
oqls.name: UpdateStaffModifierWithCreator
oqls.oql: update Staff set modifier = creator where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: update STAFF set MODIFIER_NAME = CREATOR_NAME, MODIFIER_KEY = CREATOR_KEY where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.desc: 将更新人更新为创建人（带变量）
oqls.name: UpdateStaffModifierWithCreatorVars
oqls.oql: update Staff set modifier = creator where applyId = #{applyId}
oqls.sql: update STAFF set MODIFIER_NAME = CREATOR_NAME, MODIFIER_KEY = CREATOR_KEY where APPLY_ID = #{applyId}
